Hi Ellie, below I will send you the step by step how to transfer money between own bank accounts on the Mobile app. ^Claude
Mobile Banking 1.Log in and tap Move Money 2.Tap Send money within UK 3.Tap From 4.Tap the account you want to transfer money from 5.Tap To 6.Tap the account you want to send the money to

7.Enter the Amount and change the date if you would like to transfer the money on a future date 8.Tap Review 9.Check all the details are correct and tap Confirm 10.The Confirmation screen will appear. Tap the back button (<) to go back to your accounts.
